name: 温室之城（Glass City: The Dust）
name_original: 温室之城（Glass City: The Dust）
description:
You play a role of biochemist who just moving to the FlyBird City which called Glass City by survivals, you living in a greenhouse, planting some beneficial plant, and extract substance from them which could kill germs or has special usage. and sell them on simulant internet, people from Flybird city will buy them if the merchandise are good.
Of course many AI here will share the cake with you, if you are bad luck or lost chance, you will be out.
Dont let the deadly germs swallow your people, defeat them and save the world!FEATURES
  • Special and complex substances system based on real chemical principle.
  • Stochastic system.
  • Simulant internet.
  • Special way to explore the map.
  • A market system base on realistic law, full of challenges.
